title: Police make arrests at protest in support of proscribed group Palestine Action
description: Legislation to proscribe Palestine Action came into force on 5 July, making it a criminal offence to show support for the organisation, carrying a sentence of up to 14 years in prison.
content:
Police have made arrests in central London after a "significant number of people" turned out for a Palestine Action demonstration - despite the group being banned.
Organisers Defend Our Juries said up to 700 people were at the event in Parliament Squ... [2493 chars]

title: Arrests begin in London at largest protest over Palestine Action since group’s ban
description: Met police says it has drawn officers from other forces to form ‘significant presence’ in busy weekend of protests
content:
Arrests have begun in central London at the largest demonstration relating to Palestine Action since the group was proscribed as a terrorist organisation.
The Metropolitan police said they had drawn officers from other forces to help form a “signific... [2734 chars]

title: Three people injured in shooting at New York City’s Times Square
description: NYPD say shooting took place after verbal dispute and one person is being held in custody
content:
Three people have been injured in a shooting at New York City’s Times Square after a 17-year-old opened fire, the New York police department has said.
Police said they were questioning one person who is being held in custody, but that no charges have... [1727 chars]

title: Liverpool police given extra stop and search powers for city centre
description: A Section 60 order giving officers enhanced powers will be in effect in Liverpool until 16:00 BST.
content:
Police have said they will use extra stop and search powers in Liverpool city centre.
The Section 60 order - to run until 16:00 BST - is intended "not to stop people going about their lawful business but to deter crime or serious violence", Merseysid... [322 chars]

title: Manchester United seal £73.7m deal for Benjamin Sesko from RB Leipzig
description: Manchester United have confirmed the signing of Benjamin Sesko in a deal worth up to £73.7m with RB Leipzig
content:
Manchester United have confirmed the signing of Benjamin Sesko in a deal worth up to £73.7m with RB Leipzig. The striker will join on a five-year deal and become Ruben Amorim’s fourth major signing of the summer.
